title: Kromoleo: The Haunting
overview: Zia, a young girl from Djarot, a thug nicknamed Gali, married his daughter Danang who is actually the leader of PETRUS (MYSTERIOUS SHOOTER). When Danang no longer needs Djarot and the Gali that he has been using, Danang decides to kill and slaughter them all. Since then, the restless spirits of the dead Gali have appeared, becoming a group of ghosts carrying coffins that scare the villagers called “KROMOLEO”, anyone who witnesses the Kromoleo will die because of the terror of the Kromoleo. Zia is trapped between 2 choices, choosing Danang, her grandfather or Djarot, her father.
